attributes.action: Prevent "Immune Boris" overwhelming NHS unlike when he got treated and survived
attributes.additional_details: To stop killing people before being vaccinated
attributes.background: Whilst COVID is uncontrolled and before vaccination takes place regulate Christmas activity so as not to increase 2nd spike Boris & Co has already caused, "Save the NHS" so that other citizens can receive same treatment as "Immune Boris" received.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Do not compromise the lockdown rules for Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553660

Since you started your petition the Government has restricted the relaxation of Covid-19 rules over the Christmas period. You can read the current rules here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/making-a-christmas-bubble-with-friends-and-family/making-a-christmas-bubble-with-friends-and-family
